languages.text: "Мне не терпится истребить еще больше еретиков. Всех их!"

traits.locale_text: "Мне не терпится истребить еще больше еретиков. Всех их!"

languages.text: "I cannot wait to rain righteous fire down upon each and every heretic!"
languages.original_text: "Мне не терпится истребить еще больше еретиков. Всех их!"

traits.locale_text: "I can hardly wait to rain fire upon more heretics. Each and every one of them!"
"I can hardly wait to rain fire upon more heretics. Each and every one of them!"
"I cannot wait to rain fire upon more heretics. Each and every one of them!"
"I cannot wait to rain fire upon more heretics. Each and every one of them!"
"I cannot wait to rain righteous fire down upon each and every heretic!"

languages.text: “我已经迫不及待要向那些异端分子倾泻正义的烈焰了！”
languages.original_text: "I cannot wait to rain righteous fire down upon each and every heretic!"

traits.locale_text: “我已经迫不及待要向更多异端分子开火了！我要把他们每个人都彻底消灭！”

languages.text: «¡Estoy deseando hacer que el fuego de la justicia caiga sobre todos y cada uno de esos herejes!».
languages.original_text: "I cannot wait to rain righteous fire down upon each and every heretic!"

traits.locale_text: «Estoy deseando acribillar a más herejes. ¡Hasta que no quede ni uno!».

languages.text: 「すべての異端者どもに正義の炎を降り注ぐのが待ちきれない！」
languages.original_text: "I cannot wait to rain righteous fire down upon each and every heretic!"

traits.locale_text: 「もっと多くの異端者に火の雨を売らせるのが待ちきれない。1人ひとり全員にだ！」
「すべての異端者どもに正義の炎を降り注ぐのが待ちきれない！」

languages.original_text: "I cannot wait to rain righteous fire down upon each and every heretic!"

languages.text: « J'ai hâte de faire pleuvoir le feu sacré sur tous ces hérétiques ! »
languages.original_text: "I cannot wait to rain righteous fire down upon each and every heretic!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai hâte d'exterminer tous ces hérétiques jusqu'au dernier ! »

languages.text: "Ich kann nicht warten, bis rechtschaffenes Feuer auf jeden Ketzer niedergeht!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot wait to rain righteous fire down upon each and every heretic!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann es gar nicht erwarten, Feuer auf weitere Ketzer herabregnen zu lassen. Auf jeden Einzelnen von ihnen!"

languages.text: "Erdemli ateşimizi tüm kâfirlerin üzerine yağdırmayı iple çekiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I cannot wait to rain righteous fire down upon each and every heretic!"

traits.locale_text: "Erdemli ateşimizi tüm kâfirlerin üzerine yağdırmayı iple çekiyorum."
